016package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao;
017
018import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
019import androidx.room.Dao;
020import androidx.room.Delete;
021import androidx.room.Insert;
022import androidx.room.Query;
023import androidx.room.Update;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.User;
025import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
026import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
027import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer;
028import java.util.List;
029
030/**
031 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link User} entity instances. {@code INSERT}, {@code UPDATE}, and
032 * {@code DELETE} operations are implemented as ReactiveX {@link Single} tasks, which execute on
033 * subscription; some {@code SELECT} tasks are implemented using {@link LiveData} queries, which
034 * execute on observation, or (if already being observed) on Room-based updates to the underlying
035 * tables; one {@code SELECT} ({@link #select(String)}) is implemented as a ReactiveX {@link Maybe}
036 * task, to allow for the appropriate handling of an empty query result.
037 */
038@SuppressWarnings("unused")
039@Dao
040public interface UserDao {
041
042  /**
043   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
044   * {@code user} into the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the
045   * auto-generated primary key value of the inserted record.
046   *
047   * @param user {@link User} instance to be inserted.
048   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code user} into the database.
049   */
050  @Insert
051  Single<Long> insert(User user);
052
053  /**
054   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), updates
055   * {@code user} to the database.
056   *
057   * @param user {@link User} instance to be updated.
058   * @return {@link Single} that will update {@code user} to the database.
059   */
060  @Update
061  Single<Integer> update(User user);
062
063  /**
064   * Updates and passes through a particular user, to avoid repeated queries.
065   *
066   * @param user {@link User} to be updated.
067   * @return {@link Single} of the updated {@code user}.
068   */
069  default Single<User> updateAndPassThrough(User user) {
070    return update(user)
071        .map((count) -> user);
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), deletes
076   * {@code user} from the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the number of
077   * records modified.
078   *
079   * @param user {@link User} instance to be deleted.
080   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) delete {@code user} from the database.
081   */
082  @Delete
083  Single<Integer> delete(User user);
084
085  /**
086   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of a single user, using the primary key
087   * value. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code user} table are modified using Room
088   * methods), the query is executed.
089   *
090   * @param id Unique identifier (primary key value) of the {@link User} instance of interest.
091   * @return {@link LiveData} that can be observed for the {@link User} instance of interest.
092   */
093  @Query("SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = :id")
094  LiveData<User> select(long id);
095
096  /**
097   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of a {@link List} of {@link User}
098   * entities. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code user} table are modified using Room
099   * methods), the query is executed.
100   *
101   * @return {@link LiveData} that can be observed for the {@link User} instances of interest.
102   */
103  @Query("SELECT * FROM user")
104  LiveData<List<User>> select();
105
106  /**
107   * Constructs and returns a ReactiveX-based query of a single user, using the fixed OAuth2.0
108   * identifier (subject) of the {@link User} of interest. When executed (subscribed to), the query
109   * is executed, and the result (if any) is passed to the subscribing
110   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer}; if the query does not return a result, then
111   * the subscribing {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Action}.
112   *
113   * @param oauthKey OAuth2.0 identifier (subject) of the {@link User} instance of interest.
114   * @return {@link Maybe} that can be executed (subscribed to) to obtain the {@link User} instance
115   * of interest.
116   */
117  @Query("SELECT * FROM user WHERE oauth_key = :oauthKey")
118  Maybe<User> select(String oauthKey);
119
120}
